'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 6''' is the sixth {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*26. Get Back Your Dream-Chasing Heart!! (夢追う心をとりもどせ!!, ''Yume Ou Kokoro o Torimodose!!'')
*27. Run Through! A Full Race of Faith!! (走り抜け! 信念の全カレース!!, ''Hashirinuke! Shin'nen no Zen Karēsu!!'')
*28. A Strike of Fury to Conquer Poison!! (毒を制す怒りの一撃!!, ''Doku o Seisu Ikarinoichigeki!!'')
*29. Destroy the Sky Tower!! (天空タワーを破壊せよ!!!, ''Tenkū Tawā o Hakai Seyo!!'')
*30. Explosion! Navy Cannon!! (炸裂! ネイビーキャノン!!, ''Sakuretsu! Neibīkyanon!!'')
